alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 8:55PM EST until January 07 at 12:20AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Recent heavy rains will cause rapid rises on the Green River. Paradise is expected to go into minor flooding tonight. Flooding is forecast to continue through most of the upcoming week. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 375.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 385.1 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
